module.name: Misc Destinations
module.description: Allows creating destinations that dial any local number (extensions, feature codes, outside phone numbers) that can be used by other modules (eg, IVR, time conditions) as a call destination.
module.changelog: *13.0.10* Fixing FREEPBX-21504 *13.0.9* FREEI-922 Fix XSS Bootstrap Datatable Issues *13.0.8* FREEPBX-20123 Misc destination module not working correctly *13.0.7* Fixing FREEPBX-17867 *13.0.6* FREEPBX-15214 Able to create Empty as well as Multiple Misc Destination with same Description *13.0.5* FREEPBX-12690 add view for destinations usage *13.0.4.1* FREEPBX-14524 Setting a dial string with a leading space for Misc Destination causes dial to fail *13.0.4* FREEPBX-12575 *13.0.3* FREEPBX-12386 fix labels, grid to bst and floating rnav *13.0.2* Version bump out of Beta
